name: Temporal Freeze
description: This algorithm is an audio ‘freeze’ effect – it captures sound at a moment in time and sustains it indefinitely. The ‘temporal’ part of the name indicates that it works in the time domain, in contrast to the Spectral Freeze algorithm (above). There are a number (depending on the specification) of different ‘voices’ i.e. you can freeze different moments of audio and play them simultaneously.
use_cases: Sustaining captured sound indefinitely for ambient textures or pads
Layering multiple frozen moments of audio simultaneously
Creating tape-like playback effects with adjustable speed variations
Generating evolving soundscapes using envelope controls
gui_description: The display shows information about each voice. The vertical bar on the left indicates the envelope level, and a 'T' above the voice number denotes the freeze target (Auto if no 'T'). Each voice includes a condensed waveform view of captured audio, with an incoming audio waveform at the bottom-left.

parameters.name: Freeze toggle
parameters.description: Activates a new freeze when the parameter changes from '0' to '1'.

parameters.name: Freeze gate
parameters.description: Activates a new freeze when the parameter changes from '0' to '1', and releases the freeze when the parameter changes from '1' to '0'.

parameters.name: Freeze target
parameters.description: Chooses the voice for the next freeze, or '0' for 'Auto'.

parameters.name: Unfreeze all
parameters.description: When this parameter changes to '1', all active freezes are released.

parameters.name: Auto voices
parameters.description: When the freeze target is Auto, sets how many voices will be used by the automatic voice selection. The remainder can be frozen manually.

parameters.name: Play heads
parameters.description: Sets the number of 'playback heads' (to use a tape metaphor).

parameters.name: Octave down heads
parameters.description: Sets how many of the playback heads run at half speed i.e. an octave down.

parameters.name: Attack
parameters.description: Sets the envelope attack time. Exponential scale from 0.01s to 30s.

parameters.name: Release
parameters.description: Sets the envelope release time. Exponential scale from 0.01s to 30s.

parameters.name: Freeze (per-voice)
parameters.description: Activates a new freeze on the corresponding voice when the parameter changes from '0' to '1', and releases the freeze when the parameter changes from '1' to '0'.

input_ports.name: Left/mono input
input_ports.description: Audio input for mono or left channel (bus number adjustable via parameter)

input_ports.name: Right input
input_ports.description: Audio input for right channel (optional, enables stereo operation when set)

input_ports.name: Left/mono input
input_ports.description: Sets the left or mono input audio bus.

input_ports.name: Right input
input_ports.description: Sets the right input audio bus. If not set to None, stereo operation is enabled, halving history length per voice and increasing CPU usage.

output_ports.name: Left/mono output
output_ports.description: Output bus for frozen audio left/mono channel

output_ports.name: Right output
output_ports.description: Output bus for frozen audio right channel (stereo operation only)

output_ports.name: Left/mono output
output_ports.description: Sets the left output bus for the voice.

output_ports.name: Right output
output_ports.description: Sets the right output bus for the voice.
